extensionObjects.name: SettingsAndFlags
extensionObjects.description: §fThis extension is adding some flags and settings to the gui
extensionObjects.author: Tobero

extensionObjects.name: ChatMessageExtension
extensionObjects.description: This extension is used if you want to display the faction the user is a part off. Example: [FactionName] Notch: Hello. This is an example
extensionObjects.author: Tobero

extensionObjects.name: HomeExtension
extensionObjects.description: This extension adds the ability to set a faction home. Every player with the faction home teleportation permission can get ther by using §7/f home
extensionObjects.author: Tobero
extensionObjects.info:
The home extension allows players to set a faction home and teleport to it.
§7Commands: §f/f sethome and /f home

extensionObjects.name: DynmapExtension
extensionObjects.description: §fDisplay the claimed faction chunks on the dynamp
extensionObjects.author: Tobero

extensionObjects.name: FlyCommandExtension
extensionObjects.description: §fAdd the /f fly command. You can fly in the claimed chunks
extensionObjects.author: Tobero

extensionObjects.name: MCoreConverter
extensionObjects.description: §fThis extension is for converting your massive core faction data to improvedFactions
extensionObjects.author: Tobero

extensionObjects.name: MassClaim
extensionObjects.description: §fThis extension allows a world-edit like claiming and unclaiming of chunks
extensionObjects.author: Tobero
